metadata.name: G.H.O.S.T. [INTERLUDE] COMIC ART #0
metadata.description:
"Yo! Ghost is the name, you and I are not the same, it’s time to spell things out for you lames."

The Comic Book Art Collection created from the lyrics of the debut single “G.H.O.S.T. [INTERLUDE]” from Hip-Hop’s superhero GHOST-EMC, on his quest to save his first love, Hip-Hop — the genre that raised him from destruction and return her back to the lyricism, creative concepts, consciousness, detailed storytelling, exciting wordplay and rhyme schemes that she was originally rooted in.

Each Comic Book Art is created from the lyrics of the song, bringing it to life and enabling you to “visualise the verse.” Collecting a Comic Book Art allows you to own a moment of “G.H.O.S.T. [INTERLUDE]” as a visual art piece, it also unlocks the Digital Vinyl / Audio-Visual MP4 of the song.

GHOST-EMC's journey is a visual-musical experience at the intersection Hip-Hop and Comic Book Art.
